name: LinkedIn
description: LinkedIn is a business and employment-focused social media platform that works through websites and mobile apps and The platform is primarily used for professional networking and career development, and allows jobseekers to post their CVs and employers to post jobs.
features: Online social network representing real-world professional relationships.
Create economic opportunity for every member of the global workforce.
Connect the world’s professionals to make them more productive and successful.
Headline: LinkedIn connects the world's professionals to make them more productive and successful.
ShortDescription: Manage your professional identity. Build and engage with your professional network.

Highlights.name: LinkedIn Sales Navigator
Highlights.description: Sales Navigator makes relationship-based selling easy by helping you connect with the right people.

Highlights.name: LinkedIn Recruiter
Highlights.description: LinkedIn Recruiter is an all-encompassing hiring platform for talent professionals that helps find, connect with, and manage the people you want to be on your team.

Highlights.name: LinkedIn Business Manager
Highlights.description: LinkedIn Business Manager is a managerial platform that makes it easier for organizations to manage their Campaign Manager Ad accounts and LinkedIn Pages from one place

enhanced_description: LinkedIn is a leading business and employment-focused social media platform accessible via websites and mobile apps. It is primarily used for professional networking and career development, enabling jobseekers to manage their professional identity and post CVs, while employers can post jobs. The platform aims to connect the world's professionals to make them more productive and successful, fostering real-world professional relationships and creating economic opportunity for the global workforce. Key offerings include LinkedIn Recruiter, an all-encompassing hiring platform for talent professionals; LinkedIn Sales Navigator, designed to facilitate relationship-based selling; and LinkedIn Business Manager, which helps organizations manage Campaign Manager Ad accounts and LinkedIn Pages.
competitive_advantages: Specialized platforms for recruiting (LinkedIn Recruiter) and sales (LinkedIn Sales Navigator)
Centralized platform for professional identity and career development
roi_benefits: Facilitates career development and economic opportunity
